title: Product Manager
description: Check out my work experience at JS Technology on the right!
details:
Led the development of flagship products in e-commerce digital human livestreaming industry at JS Technology, covering pre-synthesized, real-time synthesized, and virtual avatar streaming solutions.
- Led an 8-person team driving product iterations, coordinating pre-sales, sales, and after-sales operations.
- Achieved 30+ brand acquisitions, millions in revenue growth and renewals; provided 78,000 hours of livestreaming during 618 Shopping Festival, generating Â¥210M GMV.
- Improved digital human conversion rates to 30% of human livestreaming performance at only 10% of the cost.
- Led the team to win Alibaba Createathon with an experimental livestreaming product, developing a 'one-click livestreaming' concept for digital humans.

title: Product Engineer
description: Check out my responsibilities at Robosell on the right!
details:
Responsible for Robosell product implementation and commercialization, improving cart abandonment recovery for Shopify merchants.
- Led an 8-person team, optimized product development process, and drove overseas marketing and cold start initiatives.
- Achieved GMV growth and product commercialization, helping 100+ merchants maintain stable operations, gained 20+ Shoplazza site adoptions.
- Designed conversion models using behavioral data, improving cart recovery rate by nearly 30%, achieving monthly revenue exceeding $10,000.

title: International Trade & Cross-border E-commerce Seller
description: Not exactly entrepreneurship, but I was a seller for a while. Check it out on the right!
details:
Independently operated cross-border e-commerce business on Alibaba International, managing end-to-end foreign trade operations.
- Optimized product packaging, images, titles, and keywords, maintaining top 10 search rankings for main products.
- Guided customer inquiries with over 50% reorder rate.
- Balanced production and storage relationships to ensure timely delivery, improving product quality and positive reviews.

title: Frontend Engineer
description: I started my career as a frontend developer in 2016!
details:
Participated in developing smart campus education informatization products to improve teaching efficiency and school computer management.
- Contributed to Lindge Teaching Cloud and Lindge Cloud Desktop products, optimizing teaching and management processes.
- Tech stack: AngularJS, HTML5, CSS3, .NET, C#, MySQL.
- Responsible for designing business flow charts, driving development progress, conducting stress testing, creating installation packages and user manuals, deeply involved in all aspects throughout the product lifecycle.
